channel.title: How to run a RuneScape private server
channel.description:
[i]This is for the people who have just started, most would get this the first try and or visit to the site but there are people who don't. So I made a short video on how to set environment variables with lin's setter and how to download JDK. It isn't a hard thing to do but as said before there have been people that have struggled. I'm sure that this counts as a tutorial.[/i]
What this covers
[ul][*]Downloading JDK [*]Downloading Environment Variable Setter [*]Browse through Downloads sections & download source [*]Editing batch files [*]Brief editing of .java files[/ul]
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=88Gc4l1mxMY
Credits Anyone who wants them.

item.description:
@Three_One_Seven wrote:

This is for the people who have just started, most would get this the first try and or visit to the site but there are people who don’t. So I made a short video on how to set environment variables with lin’s setter and how to download JDK. It isn’t a hard thing to do but as said before there have been people that have struggled. I’m sure that this counts as a tutorial.
